description: Students study principles pertinent to prevention of injuries in sports and physical education; treatment and care of minor injuries. The course utilizes both lecture and laboratory. Offered every year.
name: Prev/Care Sport Injur
notes: Students in ESTH 255 must also register for one lab ESTH 255 AL or BL.
Students must be Exercise Science majors or have instructor's permission.
title: Prevention and Care of Athletic Injuries
